Class PGMImage

java.lang.Object
netpbm.image.PGMImage
All Implemented Interfaces:
NetPBMImages
public class PGMImage extends Object implements NetPBMImages
Represents a PGM (Portable Graymap) image in the P2 ASCII format.

This class models grayscale images using a two-dimensional array of Pixel objects, where each pixel holds identical RGB values representing a single intensity level. It conforms to the NetPBMImages interface, providing access to image metadata, pixel manipulation, and cloning functionality.

    • clone

      public NetPBMImages clone()
      Creates a deep copy of the current grayscale image.

      The clone includes all image dimensions and pixel values, with each pixel being duplicated to ensure full separation from the original instance.

      Specified by:
      clone in interface NetPBMImages
      Overrides:
      clone in class Object
      Returns:
      a new NetPBMImages object that is an exact copy of this image
